info.name: Sherdog Forums (Dark, No Sidebar)
info.description: Alternate theme for the new sherdog forums. Dark theme with no sidebar.
info.additionalInfo:
June 2018: Sherdog have applied new styles which are actually much closer to all the edits I had made. Updating this style to remove elements that are no longer in place. Making it a little less flat, and returning the colours to those used in my modification.
October 2018: removed a few other bits, little bit of cleaning, and hid the god awful topic prefixes (you can return them by undoing the code at the very end of the css)
May 2018: Few small fixes, remove anti ad block message
